title: Review Task Backlog
description: Go through task backlog, update priorities, remove obsolete tasks, and ensure task list is manageable.

todo.title: Review pending tasks
todo.notes: Check all tasks in pending folder

todo.title: Update task priorities
todo.notes: Adjust priorities based on current needs

todo.title: Remove obsolete tasks
todo.notes: Delete or archive tasks that are no longer relevant

todo.title: Consolidate similar tasks
todo.notes: Merge tasks that overlap or can be done together
